original_text: But a man who has married thinks a lot about this world's things. He wants to live in a way that makes his wife happy.
korean_text: 장가 간 자는 세상 일을 염려하여 어찌하여야 아내를 기쁘게 할까 하여

sentences.original_text: But a man who has married
thinks a lot about this world's things
sentences.korean_translation: 이 세상의 것들에 대해 많이 생각합니다

sentences.original_text: He wants to live in a way
